channel.title: Latest ditz updates for upfuckr
channel.description: Latest updates to the distributed issue tracker for upfuckr

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> closed with disposition fixed screenshots for release 0.2
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> created spinner is too faint
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> created phantom folders
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> assigned to release 0.3 from 0.2 Make the uploads cancelable
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> assigned to release 0.3 from 0.2 let user specify nonstandard ftp port
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> created Make buttons from main options menu
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> closed with disposition fixed create new remote fuckflickr folders
item.description: create a remote folder, see it displayed still need to store it in the cache

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> changed status from paused to in_progress create new remote fuckflickr folders

Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> assigned to release 0.2 from unassigned crash when you hit back from config
item.description: looks like it was fixed by the last commit

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> changed status from unstarted to in_progress create new remote fuckflickr folders
item.description: ok, need to add a button, create the folder, create the entry in the list. should it be in that order?

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> closed with disposition fixed Forward Result Flag used while also requesting a result
item.description: Changed to StartActivity and then called Finish

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> changed status from unstarted to in_progress Forward Result Flag used while also requesting a result

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> created crash when you hit back from config
Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> commented handle UnknownHostException gracefully
item.description: looks like this happens when we have no network connection. we should check this and gracefully suggest that we need a network to transport these files on.

item.title: Matt Katz <mattkatz@ubuntu> created handle UnknownHostException gracefully
